SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM tb_alarm_info WHERE 1=1 AND ai_webdir = #{ai_webdir} AND ai_webclass = #{ai_webclass} ) AS alarm_info LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tb_alarm_cmt WHERE 1=1 AND ac_webdir = #{ai_webdir} AND ac_webclass = #{ai_webclass} AND ac_yn = 'Y' ) AS alarm_cmt ON alarm_info.ai_webdir = alarm_cmt.ac_webdir AND alarm_info.ai_webclass = alarm_cmt.ac_webclass ) AS aa ORDER BY ac_regtime DESC LIMIT 1
